mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.case_seq AS "caseSeq", a.accepter AS "accepter", a.accept_date AS "acceptDate", a.case_source AS "caseSource", a.party_type AS "partyType", a.org_name AS "orgName", a.org_agent AS "orgAgent", a.org_code AS "orgCode", a.org_responsible_person AS "orgResponsiblePerson", a.org_responsible_person_post AS "orgResponsiblePersonPost", a.org_address AS "orgAddress", a.org_phone AS "orgPhone", a.psn_name AS "psnName", a.psn_organization AS "psnOrganization", a.psn_code AS "psnCode", a.psn_birthday AS "psnBirthday", a.psn_post AS "psnPost", a.psn_address AS "psnAddress", a.psn_phone AS "psnPhone", a.psn_sex AS "psnSex", a.case_happen_date AS "caseHappenDate", a.case_happen_address AS "caseHappenAddress", a.project_code AS "projectCode", a.project_name AS "projectName", a.case_cause AS "caseCause", a.case_transfer AS "caseTransfer", a.transfer_case_id AS "transferCaseId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tcase a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.accept_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{acceptDateFrom},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.accept_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{acceptDateTo},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{createDateFrom},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{createDateTo},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND a.org_name like concat('%',#{orgName},'%')
AND a.psn_name like concat('%',#{psnName},'%')
AND a.case_cause like concat('%',#{caseCause},'%')
AND a.case_transfer=#{caseTransfer}
AND (a.case_transfer='0' OR a.case_transfer is NULL )
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tcase( case_seq, accepter, accept_date, case_source, party_type, org_name, org_agent, org_code, org_responsible_person, a.org_responsible_person_post, org_address, org_phone, psn_name, psn_organization, psn_code, psn_birthday, psn_post, psn_address, psn_phone, psn_sex, case_happen_date, case_happen_address, project_code, project_name, case_cause, case_transfer, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{caseSeq}, #{accepter}, #{acceptDate}, #{caseSource}, #{partyType}, #{orgName}, #{orgAgent}, #{orgCode}, #{orgResponsiblePerson}, #{orgResponsiblePersonPost}, #{orgAddress}, #{orgPhone}, #{psnName}, #{psnOrganization}, #{psnCode}, #{psnBirthday}, #{psnPost}, #{psnAddress}, #{psnPhone}, #{psnSex}, #{caseHappenDate}, #{caseHappenAddress}, #{projectCode}, #{projectName}, #{caseCause}, #{caseTransfer}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tcase SET case_seq = #{caseSeq}, accepter = #{accepter}, accept_date = #{acceptDate}, case_source = #{caseSource}, party_type = #{partyType}, org_name = #{orgName}, org_agent = #{orgAgent}, org_code = #{orgCode}, org_responsible_person = #{orgResponsiblePerson}, org_responsible_person_post = #{orgResponsiblePersonPost}, org_address = #{orgAddress}, org_phone = #{orgPhone}, psn_name = #{psnName}, psn_organization = #{psnOrganization}, psn_code = #{psnCode}, psn_birthday = #{psnBirthday}, psn_post = #{psnPost}, psn_address = #{psnAddress}, psn_phone = #{psnPhone}, psn_sex = #{psnSex}, case_happen_date = #{caseHappenDate}, case_happen_address = #{caseHappenAddress}, project_code = #{projectCode}, project_name = #{projectName}, case_cause = #{caseCause}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
